body:
I'm leaving avicus and minecraft in general permanently because I simply don't enjoy the game anymore and I want to focus more on school.

It's been fun since 4 ish years ago.


Thanks to the following people for being cool:

Everyone currently on Jalapenos

Celestial, but especially Rocky, Poofy, Mongul for being there to meme around with

OVanGogh, pretty cool snapchatting with you

Okiba, old friend from long time ago

Absolab, still remember you from a long ass time ago

Henry, for memeing around with me whenever we both had time and sending me moist memes on insta

And basically everyone on my friend list...


If you want to contact me, use discord "david#0999"


Later

Goodbye and have fun in life.

#ToxicMod
